original_text: But the other man stood far away. He would not even look up towards heaven. He was hitting his body with his hands to show how sorry he was. He prayed like this: “Please, God, be kind to me. I have done many bad things.” ’
korean_text: 세리는 멀리 서서 감히 눈을 들어 하늘을 쳐다보지도 못하고 다만 가슴을 치며 이르되 하나님이여 불쌍히 여기소서 나는 죄인이로소이다 하였느니라

sentences.original_text: But the other man stood far away
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 다른 사람은 멀리 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: He would not even look up towards heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하늘을 향해 고개조차 들지 않았습니다

sentences.original_text: He was hitting his body with his hands
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 몸을 손으로 치고 있었습니다
